timeline.message: Standardizing to use the PortraitChooser instead of the older icon selector

timeline.bodyText: Can this be null? If not lets require it to be non-null here.
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText: No code using AbstractIcon should be nullable outside of the GUI. That is the base design for AbstractIcon.
replies.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: However, I've added an assert cause here and will open a PR or perhaps PRs to ensure this is the case in MM and elsewise in MHQ too.
replies.author: Windchild292

timeline.message: AbstractIcon: Adding assert to ensure the portrait assigned to
